name: Incoming Orcs!
description:
Some hotshot hero decided to fight the Quantum Orcs of Quantum island.  They stole his boat and now he must fight for his life! fortunately he can summon guns out of thin for for some odd reason.  Anyways, help him survive!

WASD to move, Mouse to shoot, Sprint is space.

More guns become available as time goes on, each gun is unique.  

Made for miz jam 1, go ahead and check it out. To anyone in the discord who's wondering, yes I am the scratch guy.
